titleInfo.title: Adolph Kiesler, Governor Ed Johnson and President Harry S. Truman

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 7 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Gov., Pres. Harry Truman, Adolph Kiesler.'' On envelope: ''121 Adolph Kiesler, Gov Johnson, Pres Truman.'' Handwritten on paper in envelope: ''#121 Adolph Kiesler with Governor Ed Johnson & President Harry S. Truman., Courtesy of the Allied Jewish Federation of Denver.''

mods.abstract: Left to right: Governor Ed Johnson, President Harry S. Truman, and Adolph Kiesler standing in front of a microphone.
mods.note: Donated by the Allied Jewish Federation of Denver.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
